title: An Unseemly Lady
summary:
Julianne is as close to perfect as it gets: she’s got looks, talent, and smarts. The only problem is she has terrible taste in men! That’s why her little sister Lilianne is doing everything she can to make sure she doesn’t end up with the wrong guy. However, Julianne’s suitors are quickly catching on that the way to her heart is through Lilianne’s sweet tooth! How far will Lilianne go to set her sister up with the right man? Who will be the sweetest suitor?

---
I was the only younger sister of the female protagonist in the reverse harem novel. In addition, I was exceptionally pampered by the female lead after waking up after being very sick. I used that to defeat the original inexcusable trash male leads who only hurt my sister…

‘Lili, how are you? Do you like cake?’

‘Lili is really pretty because she resembles her sister. Won’t you eat cookies? Please tell your sister that these were given to you by your wonderful brother.’

‘Would you like to eat this and go over there for a while? I have something to say to your uncle and sister.’

For some reason, the male lead candidates seem anxious to see me.

**

“I don’t play with ugly kids," the boy in front of me muttered with a deep frown.

What? Did you really just say that? I’ll show you what the real world is like.

I gently pulled the hem of my sister’s clothes and shook my head, “I hate him, so I hate the older brother who brought him.”

At the same time, Cedric’s face turned pale, similar to someone who had been sentenced to death.

title: I Saved You, but I’m Not Responsible
summary:
I was the one abandoned, yet I seem to have grown up the most mentally stable! 

I was ordered to serve my fake counterpart as her maid, so I decided to go undercover. But something's off with my former family. Whatever, it's not my problem! So, I just focused on my task... 

"Are you really not going to live with us?"

The eldest, who used to show obsessive control over the fake, started acting strangely toward me. 
"I never thought I’d feel such camaraderie and trust with the opposite sex. You’re strangely too comfortable." 

The second brother, who was on the brink of falling into darkness, managed to get back on track thanks to me. 
"I didn’t come here to help them film their regret-filled family drama." 

I tried to ignore everything and quickly moved on to my next mission… but why do I keep running into people whose lives are completely messed up? 

Why is everyone in perfect need of saving?

title: Welcome to Dungeon Hotel
summary: In the Lapland region of Finland, the domain of snow, midnight sun, and auroras, there is the small Hotel Metsäpeura, run by two older gentlemen. One night during a terrible blizzard, a mysterious young man named Jun arrives at the hotel. He is clearly in dire straits, with a large tattoo on his back, no relatives and no money. However, the gentlemen warmly welcome him in and offer him a job at the hotel. The kindness of the people living in the harshness of nature will melt the heart of this awkward young man.

title: Secret Contract With The Black Duke
The Grim Reaper Duke’s Obsessive Contract Mother
summary:
Killed by her own husband, the prince, Lady Amelie wakes up one year before her doomed marriage. Determined to change her fate, she proposes a contract marriage to Duke Gazelle Isaac—infamously known as the “Grim Reaper.”

His only condition?

She must bond with his emotionally scarred twins.

Surrounded by secrets and shadows, can Amelie rewrite destiny—for herself and the feared duke?

title: Fakes Don’t Want To Be Real
summary: Humans that wear clothing with ancient elements, knights that use elemental magic, cultivators that soar through the sky on their swords, a loli squad who fights using nanomachines, undeads who came from a door to another world, Super Saiyans… These all aren't important, what's important is: "Do you want to become rich"? Top of the realms! Strongest in the universe! Earning the name of the richest man alive in Forbes! Taking you on journeys around the realms! Teach you how to be the richest! Teaching you how to achieve financial freedom! Earn an astronomically large sum of money!!

title: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
summary:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

title: The Chick-Class Hunter is Filial!
summary: In a world where special powers awaken in individuals, a 4-year-old child becomes an S-class hunter but has no parents. Assigned a quest to find guardians, she is eventually adopted by the nation’s top hunter. With a new skill that allows her to register caregivers and earn "filial piety points" for growth, she sets out to gather the best guardians to grow stronger and thrive.

title: Juvenile Prison
summary:
Juyeong is in a juvenile detention center for the attempted murder of his father, Gang-ryong. He clings to hope, dreaming of a future in Seoul with his childhood friend, Dayeon. 

But everything shatters when Dayeon is tragically killed by a rogue truck, and the devastation deepens when Juyeong learns that his father was behind the wheel. 

In a cruel twist, Gang-ryong regains consciousness and offers Juyeong an ultimatum...

"If you want revenge, become the king of this detention center!"

 Now, Juyeong must navigate the treacherous world of prison politics, determined to rise to power and avenge his friend.

title: God of the Apocalypse
summary:
All Jeong wants is a second chance -- for revenge! His grandfather’s gruesome death has transformed him into the bloodthirsty and ruthless Scythe Demon. He will stop at nothing until he has killed the man responsible. Yet rage and determination alone are not enough. He must train in martial arts if he ever wants to stand a chance against such a formidable foe. Will he succeed in his revenge on the murderer of his grandfather?

**Original Webtoon:**  
- [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=821597)
- [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=10782038)

**Official Translations:**  
- [S.Chinese](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/ANCIENTCHINESE/guaililuanshen/list?title_no=2722)

- [Indonesian](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/myst-might-mayhem/list?title_no=6367)
- [Thai](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/myst-might-mayhem/list?title_no=6511)
- [Japanese](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0003353)
- [French](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/myst-might-mayhem/list?title_no=6711)

title: Juvenile Prison
summary:
Juyeong is in a juvenile detention center for the attempted murder of his father, Gang-ryong. He clings to hope, dreaming of a future in Seoul with his childhood friend, Dayeon. 

But everything shatters when Dayeon is tragically killed by a rogue truck, and the devastation deepens when Juyeong learns that his father was behind the wheel. 

In a cruel twist, Gang-ryong regains consciousness and offers Juyeong an ultimatum...

"If you want revenge, become the king of this detention center!"

 Now, Juyeong must navigate the treacherous world of prison politics, determined to rise to power and avenge his friend.

title: God of the Apocalypse
summary:
All Jeong wants is a second chance -- for revenge! His grandfather’s gruesome death has transformed him into the bloodthirsty and ruthless Scythe Demon. He will stop at nothing until he has killed the man responsible. Yet rage and determination alone are not enough. He must train in martial arts if he ever wants to stand a chance against such a formidable foe. Will he succeed in his revenge on the murderer of his grandfather?

- [Japanese](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0003353)
- [French](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/myst-might-mayhem/list?title_no=6711)

title: The Tang Clan Chronicles
summary: Fabre, a famous million-viewer streamer known for his daring encounters with venomous creatures, is bitten by a black mamba while filming in Africa and wakes up in the mystical world of Murim. To his surprise, the jungles of Murim offer him a peaceful farming life in which he enjoys cultivating various poisonous species. But his tranquility is short-lived when he crosses paths with members of the Tang Clan, the masters of poison and devious tactics. "I see potential in you. Become a part of our family.""

title: The Genius Grandson of Namgung Clan
summary: When young Hahyeon Shin’s mother sacrifices herself to give him a chance to escape the family she married into, he finds himself alone in a hostile world. His only goal is to find his mother’s family, the House of Namgung, and train in martial arts to avenge her and become a protector of the innocent. But when he is tested by the Namgung family, they discover that he is a martial arts genius with a perfect physique and the potential to become the greatest martial artist who ever lived.

title: The Regretful Villainess Is Happy Because She Got Divorced
summary: After waking up as the villainess in a dark fantasy romance novel, Marlena was destined to be nothing more than the cold male lead’s scorned wife. Wanting no part in his cruel love story, she demanded a divorce. But just as she begins to enjoy her new life, both her ex-husband and the second male lead start chasing after her!

title: Ministry of Strategy and Finance
summary:
Lee Seong-jun was always a good person. And with a smile on his face, he ran the country into the ground.

Wasting a 5,000 trillion won budget to chase approval ratings plunged South Korea into its second IMF crisis. His life as the president who ruined the country over, Lee Seong-jun finds himself 30 years in the past.

He returns to find a budget proposal — riddled with dirty tricks, corruption, and blatant self-interest — being pushed through the Ministry of Economy and Finance.

title: I Committed a One-Night Mistake with the Young Lady?
I will temporarily protect the male lead
summary:
I somehow took over the body of a villainess in a novel. Originally, I was supposed to die after coveting the male lead, but instead, I decided to become a rich unemployed woman and enjoy a life full of pleasures.

"You said you wanted to raise a puppy, so this brother went to hunt one for you. How's your brother's hunting skills?"

Until my brother came back after hunting the male lead who had turned into a wolf…
–
Having been forced to look after the male lead, I somehow succeeded in taming him after many twists and turns. Now all that's left is to look for this mysterious female lead and hand over the leash, then it will be all over. But…

"Have you become tired of me?"

"No, not at all."

"Then why do you keep trying to send me to a strange person?"

Maybe it's because he has stayed with me for too long, but it seems he has lost his social skills and has also developed separation anxiety.

"That person is someone very important to Your Highness."

"The only person who is important to me is you."

"Are you sure?"

"Yes, because I've imprinted," he whispered and curved the corner of his eyes, "on you."

The half-bent, bright yellow eyes were brimming with obsession.

---
Rosetta Kazel is enjoying her life as the villainess of a novel, until she's given a silver wolf to be her new pet. Rosetta knows this is none other than the cursed male lead of the novel, Prince Sihael von Idris, who's become stuck in his wolf form! To follow the novel, all Rosetta has to do is look after the wolf prince until the female lead can show up. But what if events have changed so much from the novel that she never turns up? How long will Rosetta be stuck caring for this unruly pup?

---

[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55937153)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EB%A5%BC-%EC%9E%84%EC%8B%9C%EB%B3%B4%ED%98%B8-%EC%A4%91%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3091), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60651851)

title: I Love the One Who Kills Me
summary:
She is someone with the nickname “Seatmate Killer”, and also one of the prettiest girl in the school. Every male student that became her seatmate has confessed to her, and all of them got rejected brutally. The one who became her new seatmate, the seat being located the furthest away from the front and beside one of the windows, thus being a godly seat that will make every male student jealous, is Narito Yuki. He is someone that generally you won’t notice at all. The entire class thought that he will fall for her in a short time, but that may not be the case……
___
[Alt Official English (Tentai Books)](https://tentaibooks.com/novel-author/aresanzui/)

title: The Little Princess Waits for the Breakup
The Blooming Violet in the Back Garden
summary:
On the day the streets and flowers burn, Violeta, a kitchen assistant, wakes up as a saint who is destined to defeat absolute evil. She avoids the corrupt priests and chooses to be the adopted daughter of the king's sword, the Marquis, but just because she was born from a humble region she is treated coldly by the priests.

Among them, the affectionate Daniel is their only consolation. However, at the moment when everyone in the aristocracy rejected her, it was not he who reached out, but Esselmund, the successor to the cold and ruthless Marquis.

"You don't need to do anything, Violeta just needs to stand still and blossom into the little flowers and chaos."

title: The Youngest Daughter of the Villainous Duke
summary:
After passing out drunk on a cold night, I awake as a nameless young orphan girl. But she's not just any girl, she's a character from a novel I wrote in high school! Abused and sold at auction as a slave, I'm suddenly rescued by my father, Duke Henry Wensgrey, the story's original villain. Far from the wicked character I created, he's now a total fool for his daughter. But our relationship isn't the only thing that's changed, and I soon discover that this world isn't anything like what I wrote!

---
I possessed a character in a novel I had never finished writing when I was in high school. And then now I have the body of a supporting character instead of the main character. It was a seven-year-old orphan girl with no name… Having to suffer the abuse of others, until I got really tired and ran away from that place. But I was captured and sold as a slave. I thought my life was over… But the person who saved me was the novel's most prominent villain, Henriette.

He treats the emperor like a puppet. A person who has a reputation for being extremely cruel in the original and has a hobby of cutting the throat of aristocrats. …Is he my biological father? But other than that terrible reputation, living with him wasn’t bad either.

"Okay, my daughter. You can do whatever you want. If you want something, everyone in the family will do what you want."

Wait… I didn't write a novel like that in the first place?

title: The Ordinary Lawyer’s Subspace
summary:
A strange door appears in front of lawyer Han Beom-sang.

Beyond it lies a space where time stands still.

title: The Princess Imprints a Traitor
summary:
After the fall of the empire due to the homunculi, Evienrose, the 7th Princess, dies after drinking poison given by her younger sister who has taken their side. When she opens her eyes again, she has returned 8 years to the past. To stop the fall of the imperial family, Eve decides to turn 'Mikhael', the leader of the homunculi and the 'Monster of the Floating Prison', into her appointed knight.

"Mikhael, I need you, very much."

---
Princess Evienrose, despite advocating fiercely for the rights of the homunculi rebels, now awaits death at their hands… that is until she is poisoned by her own sister! Awakening eight years in the past, Eve now has one goal: become the Empress and liberate the homunculi to stop the rebellion from ever happening! To do this, she appoints the rebel king himself, Mikaelis Agnito, as her personal knight. But with Eve’s scheming sisters standing in the way, the fight for the crown is on, and the fate of the Hadelamid empire rests in her hands!

---
The seventh imperial princess, Evenrose, once died. Her last memory was of the royal family was destroyed by the Homunculus, the rebelling slaves, and of her sister who had sided with the rebels and urged her to escape her painful execution by swallowing poison. But when she opened her eyes again, "I...I'm not dead." She realizes that she had gone eight years back in time, back to a time before her cruel sister Bridgette was chosen as the next emperor. Given the opportunity to prevent the fall of the imperial family by being chosen as the next emperor herself, she decides to write her own article about Michael, the king of Homunculus and the monster of public prison, in order to win the emperor's heart. "I need you, Michael. Very badly." Will Evenrose be able to get him and protect the imperial family safely?

---
Other Official Translations:

* [Simplified Chinese / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/The-Traitor-Conqueror-Princess/3471)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66840)

title: I Ended Up Training the Villain Too Well Too Early
summary: On their 10th birthday, a child regains memories of a past life and realizes their family is destined to be destroyed by a future villain. To prevent this, they decide to raise the neglected prince, the future villain, with care and guidance. However, their efforts work too well, leading to unintended consequences.

title: The Count’s Youngest Son is A Player
summary:
Dohyeon is a top-ranking gamer in Connect, an immersive VR game that is overrun by corrupt guilds. After being murdered for discovering a mythical item, he wakes up as Lord Raul Ashton, an NPC in a closed beta version of Connect. 

Now the sole player in this realm, he decides to use his knowledge from his past life to prevent the downfall of House Ashton and unlock unprecedented powers. For Dohyeon, Connect is no longer just a game—it’s now his reality. 

Join him as he embarks on a thrilling quest to reshape his fate!

title: Four Choices
summary: A perfectionist model student believed love was a luxury. Suddenly, four choices appear and her heart wavers. Is this okay?

title: The Princess Of A Fallen Kingdom Kisses Him Morning And Night To Break The Curse
summary:
Cheryl, the princess of a fallen country, was cursed by Piany, the princess of the enemy country that destroyed her country, to "burn her body when exposed to sunlight," and she spent her days being tortured. However, when Liam, a handsome general, came to the castle to occupy it, Cheryl was protected. As an efficient way to break the curse, she decided to kiss Liam morning and night to inject his magical power into her...!?
This kiss was necessary to break the curse. But that was all it was supposed to be--

title: Black Chain
summary: The Emperor’s consort committed suicide. Hassolan, who devoted 14 years to Emperor Akelans, hung herself but woke up 14 years in the past. No matter what, she keeps returning to that day. The once cold Emperor now fiercely refuses to let her go, saying, “You are my mate. If you don’t want it, I won’t be Emperor.”

title: In the Grasp of a Loving Yet Possessive Male Lead
For your Murder
Player Elimination Plan! When Anomalies Descend Upon The Human World
summary: The apocalypse prophecy has come true. A dark celestial body draws near, turning the entire Blue Star into a doomsday game. All of humanity has been reduced to NPCs—helpless prey for players from beyond the stars. As the world mutates and players run rampant, despair consumes mankind… Until Yun Qi awakens a hidden class, gaining the power to strike back against the players.

title: The Beloved Saint Is A Princess Healer
summary:
In a kingdom divided by class and power, Eira, a young commoner with a mysterious gift, is thrust into the dangerous world of nobles, magic, and political intrigue. Her life changes when she catches the attention of Crown Prince Alvin, whose protective instincts toward her grow stronger with each encounter.
But their connection is surrounded by peril—Eira becomes a target for those seeking to exploit her abilities or harm the prince through her. From being abducted and nearly sold into a brothel to surviving assassination attempts, she faces constant threats from both the shadows of the criminal underworld and the glittering halls of the royal court. Alongside Alvin, whose cold and commanding presence hides deep care for her, Eira navigates tangled relationships with allies, enemies, and those whose loyalties are unclear. In this world, where magical restraints, political games, and whispered rumors shape every move, she must learn to protect herself and decide if she can trust not only Alvin’s protection—but his heart.

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: The Great Mage of the Hero’s Party Reincarnates
summary:
At age 13, the genius wizard Rin embarked on a journey with Lista and the hero party to defeat the great evil known as “the Abyss,” which sought to plunge the world into chaos. But as the battle grew more intense, Rin’s body succumbed to the dark poison of the Abyss, putting his life in grave danger.

With the words “I’ll come back,” Rin’s soul entered a forced dormancy, only to reawaken 300 years later as a noble boy. Starting his second life in a peaceful world, Rin discovers that on one side of the world, the destined forces of darkness are beginning to stir once more.

---
The battle with the arch-nemesis resumes after 300 years. The genius wizard, Lynn, embarks on a grand journey, at the age of 13. Together with the party of heroes, led by Esther, they aim to defeat the great evil “Abyss” that intends to throw the world into chaos. However, the battles becomes increasingly fierce and at the final moment, Lynn succumbs to the dark poison of the “Abyss”. Leaving behind the words “I’ll be back”, Lynn’s soul falls dormant for 300 years, before being resurrected into the body of a boy of noble birth. Thus begins his second life in a peaceful world. But in the meantime, a dark force is brooding once again, threatening to plunge the world into turmoil once again.

---
The warrior Lista heard the rumors about the great magician Rin, hailed as a genius for becoming the youngest 4-star mage. Lista recruited him to join her party to fight the forces of the void but, right before the final battle, Rin’s body succumbed to the void’s dark poison. As he drew his last breath, Rin cast an immortality spell, encasing his body in ice and promising Lista that he would return. Rin kept his promise and returned after 300 years--but reborn in the body of a noble boy.

title: The Support Ate it All
summary:
The protagonist, who was enjoying the RPG game Dragon Slayer Academy, succeeds in raising 1,000 S-class heroes as the strongest supporter in the game.

One day, a mysterious quest window appears in front of him, and he is presented with a hidden quest that allows him to raise EX-class heroes that surpass S-class heroes.

Upon accepting the quest, he finds himself transported into the game world of Dragon Slayer Academy...

title: The Castle: Ghost-eyed Bride
School of Romance Fantasy
summary:
"My school suddenly turned into the romance fantasy novel I was reading?!"

Sanho, the protagonist, becomes the only commoner at a prestigious academy academy and the only one who remembers the real world.

While she's still trying to make sense of the bizarre situation, a sudden mission alert pops up.

To uncover the truth behind this strange new world, she must complete missions that involve winning over three male leads...

In a world unknown, can Sanho complete the missions and face the truth?

title: How to Choose Your Knight
Do Your Best and Regret
summary:
A woman who spent fourteen years loving those who never saw her worth finally walks away, choosing the one person who chose her first, a decorated duke. 

But as she embraces this new life, the very people who ignored her now desperately cling to her shadow.

title: Brinny And The Empty Seat
summary:
The story of a possessor from a book who, for the sake of its goal, won’t mind killing others.

Brinny, who’s living while adapting to her stepfather, thought that story had nothing to do with her. Up until she was swept into an incident with the sickly second prince, Lucian.

In the midst of the crisis, Brinny rescued Lucian by displaying her superhuman strength, and looking at the possessor ‘Ariadna’ tied up had reassured her that everything had been resolved.

But for whatever reason, her beloved older sister and the first prince died in a carriage accident, and then even Lucian, who later becomes her fiance, started to display some abnormal behavior.

The possessor wasn’t executed in the past.
Would ‘Ariadna’ still be alive?
In order to regain the empty seats of their lost loved ones, Brinny made a decision.

To fight against the possessor.

title: Young Love (2025)
The Saintess Became the Northern Grand Duke’s Daughter
summary: Born Again to Escape, and to Heal a Broken Heart Liriette, blessed with divine power that could heal others through her blood, had spent her short life as nothing more than a tool for a cruel High Priest. Her end came quietly, used and discarded. But one day, she opened her eyes… and she was 10 years old again. "This time, I will never let the horrors of my past repeat themselves." Determined to escape the clutches of the High Priest, Liriette sought refuge in the farthest corner of the empire, with none other than Duke Windsorice, the ruler of the cold and mysterious North. "I can heal your eyes. Please, let me stay by your side." At first, it was simply a desperate attempt to escape her dreadful fate. Yet, as time passed, her hopes and dreams began to grow beyond mere survival. "Would you… become my daughter?" With trembling hands and a soft voice, Liriette asked, "What would you gain from me as your daughter?" The Duke's lips curled into the faintest smile. "A kind and beautiful daughter." Follow the heartwarming journey of a lonely girl who finds her home and happiness as the beloved daughter of the empire’s coldest Duke. Watch as the once-unfeeling ruler becomes the ultimate doting father, melting the icy North with his newfound love.

title: I’ll Be The Matriarch In This Life
summary: Hard-pressed to find good luck in this universe, Sun Woojoo gives up on his dream of becoming an idol in favor of living a normal life. That is, until he finds himself waking up from a car accident on his exam day! But as luck would have it, Woojoo can now copy any move exactly as he sees it, and his two left feet that kept him from debuting are now moving to the beat! With this newfound skill, will Woojoo be able to turn things around and become the star that shines the brightest on stage?

title: The Rankers Guide to Live an Ordinary Life
summary:
The first S-class Awakened is really a third-rate student?!

In the 21st century, the world became a 'fantasy'. In a South Korea filled with despair, S-classes have descended! The greatest of them - Witch Queen Jyo!

"Goddess Jyo... Queen Jyo... Who are you...? Who could it be?"

The true identity of the savior who has been shrouded in mystery for 10 years. Her identity? Gyung Jyo, a third-rate student, who's unable to make outgoing calls due to her mother's anger.and on the verge of being strangled and trapped in the abyss.

She was leading a peaceful and ordinary life as Korea's top unemployed person, however...

[The rankings are being updated.]
[Your current ranking has dropped to 2nd place.] 

"!?"

"I know who you are, Witch Queen."

Baek Dohyun, a regressor, appears in front of Gyung Jyo!

Will Gyung Jyo, an S-class Munchkin ranker, be able to maintain her comfortable and lazy tyrant life, as her well-rolling life turns upside down into the position of the world's savior?

---
In a world filled with towers, dungeons, and monsters, some people have awakened with special powers. While these hunters risk their lives in battle and climb the world rankings, Jio Gyeon is happy to just sit back and enjoy a simple life of leisure. But Jio has a secret—she’s the strongest hunter in the world. But when a time traveling stranger warns her of humanity’s bleak future, will Jio finally take action? And what enemies are waiting for her to reveal her true identity?

title: The Duke’s Obsession with His Wife
summary: No summary available.

title: Another Woman’s Man
summary:
Jung Eun-ae, whose life goal is to marry Jin-hong—an undeniably perfect boyfriend—and to build a family anyone would envy.

Growing weary of her boyfriend, who fails to fill her loneliness,

she finds herself drawn to her senior, Lee Jae-won,

who, despite his seemingly indifferent demeanor, is surprisingly considerate.

Despite knowing that he is a married man,

she begins to feel an attraction toward him,

and in order to have him,

she consciously—or perhaps unconsciously—starts to shatter her own moral beliefs one by one...

title: Player Who Returned 10,000 Years Later
summary:
Oh Kangwoo the Demon King has had it with ruling over Hell and wants to return to Earth. 

But when he finally gets there, not only are his powers sealed, but the Earth he once knew has turned into an MMORPG free-for-all. 

Dimensional gates have appeared all over the world, and "players" enter them to make a living by hunting monsters. If Kangwoo wants to survive in this dangerous game, he's going to have to level up, and fast. 

But for this demon king, hell on earth might be worse than Hell itself!

title: Childhood Friend of the Zenith
summary: Kazuma Suzuki was just your average high schooler—until his childhood friend, Rua Takayashiki, a beautiful, sharp-tongued girl who also happened to be the granddaughter of the school chairman and the nation's top idol, cut all ties with him using a line straight out of a drama. Forced into submission for years as her so-called childhood friend, Kazuma decides it's finally time for his first-ever rebellion. He's done playing lapdog. This time, he's taking back his freedom—and aiming for a normal school life. Escaping a powerful beauty like her is easier said than done...

title: I randomly have a new career every week
summary: After being fired from his company, Lin Yi accidentally gets the All-Pro Experience System. Lin Yi relies on the various career arrangements and generous rewards given by the system to achieve his ambition and path to wealth step by step, becoming the ultimate all-powerful big brother who dominates the world.
